Report.Query: select oper_date as OperatingDate, '' as StartDate, '' as EndDate, dep_shift_count as SeqCount, oper_mileage as RunMiles, trans_capacity as LoadPassengerCapability, trans_count_per_bus as LoadPassengerPerBus, trans_count_per_km as LoadPassengerPerMile, org_group as OrgName, org_group_id as OrgID, '' as PeakHour , Area_Code as AreaCode from RPT_SPLYSECU_CAPACITY_INVEST
